data.claim: UI Typography Best Practices 2026: Base font 16px for body. Line height: body 1.5-2x, headings 1-1.25x. Letter spacing: use em values (like -0.1em) for headings. Need 5+ weights (light/regular/medium/semibold/bold) with italics. Max 2 typefaces per design. Top free fonts: Inter, DM Sans, Satoshi, Geist Sans, Public Sans, Mona Sans, Space Grotesk. Avoid: ultra-light weights (<300) for small text, use 400-500 for body, 600-700 for headings.
